sentences.sContent: ...No one knows how new spin off technology from the international space station will help us in the future...
...schoolchildren on international assessments of math and science...
...You’ve established reputation in international banking circles...
...I’d like to think I can do some work that will contribute to international corporation and understanding...
...academic and economic benefit international students bring--is being put at risk...
...so the government needs to ensure that institutions have all the support they need to attract international students who make a tremendous academic...
...they will meet in Copenhagen in December to negotiate a new international climate treaty...
...The globalization of education means more universities will be seeking heads with international experience of some kind of promote international programs and attract a global student body...
...you may not know that he also holds a master's degree in criminology and studied abroad for a year with the international police force which deals with crimes around the world...
